insert into MEETING_ROOM( ID , NAME , CAPACITY , LOCATION_ID , LOCATION_NAME , DESCRPTION , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_CODE , ADMIN_NAME , ADMIN_PHONE , YN_PUBLIC , ORDER_BY , OWNER_DEPT_ID , OWNER_DEPT_CODE , OWNER_DEPT_NAME , YN_APPROVE , APPROVAL_IDS , APPROVAL_CODES , APPROVAL_NAMES , YN_VALID , NOTE , ATTRIBUTE_01 , ATTRIBUTE_02 , ATTRIBUTE_03 , ATTRIBUTE_04 , ATTRIBUTE_05 , ATTRIBUTE_06 , ATTRIBUTE_07 , ATTRIBUTE_08 , ATTRIBUTE_09 , ATTRIBUTE_10 , SECRET_LEVEL , ORG_IDENTITY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DEPT , CREATION_DATE , LAST_UPDATED_BY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE , LAST_UPDATE_IP , VERSION , MT_DEVICE_IDS , MT_DEVICE_CODES , MT_DEVICE_NAMES )
select #{item.id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.capacity,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.locationId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.locationName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.descrption,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.adminId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.adminCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.adminName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.adminPhone,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ynPublic,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.orderBy,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.ownerDeptId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ownerDeptCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ownerDeptName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ynApprove,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.approvalIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.approvalCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.approvalNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.ynValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.note,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute01,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute02,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute03,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute04,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute05,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute06,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute07,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute08,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.attribute09,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.attribute10,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.secretLevel,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.createdDept,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} , #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.version,jdbcType = DECIMAL} , #{item.mtDeviceIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.mtDeviceCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{item.mtDeviceNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update MEETING_ROOM
ID = #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
NAME = #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CAPACITY = #{capacity,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
LOCATION_NAME = #{locationName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
DESCRPTION = #{descrption,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ADMIN_CODE = #{adminCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ADMIN_NAME = #{adminName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ADMIN_PHONE = #{adminPhone,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
YN_PUBLIC = #{ynPublic,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ORDER_BY = #{orderBy,jdbcType = DECIMAL} ,
OWNER_DEPT_ID = #{ownerDeptId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
OWNER_DEPT_CODE = #{ownerDeptCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
OWNER_DEPT_NAME = #{ownerDeptName,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
YN_APPROVE = #{ynApprove,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
APPROVAL_IDS = #{approvalIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
APPROVAL_CODES = #{approvalCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
APPROVAL_NAMES = #{approvalNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
YN_VALID = #{ynValid,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_01 = #{attribute01,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_02 = #{attribute02,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_03 = #{attribute03,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_04 = #{attribute04,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_05 = #{attribute05,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_06 = #{attribute06,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_07 = #{attribute07,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_08 = #{attribute08,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ATTRIBUTE_09 = #{attribute09,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
ATTRIBUTE_10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
SECRET_LEVEL = #{secretLevel,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
ORG_IDENTITY = #{orgIdentity,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATED_DEPT = #{createdDept,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} ,
LAST_UPDATE_IP = #{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
VERSION = version+1 ,
MT_DEVICE_IDS = #{mtDeviceIds,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
MT_DEVICE_CODES = #{mtDeviceCodes,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ,
MT_DEVICE_NAMES = #{mtDeviceNames,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
where id = #{id} and version = #{version}
